title: 6th Annual MVP Awards Winners: Connected Home Category | Pro Builder
text:
Awards 6th Annual MVP Awards: Connected Home
The Most Valuable Product Awards showcase the best in new building product design, innovation, and functionality. Here are the winners in the Connected Home category
April 11, 2024 Continue Reading GOLD Kaadas
KA227-V Wi-Fi Video Doorbell Smart Deadbolt Lock with Dual Fingerprint Sensor
Image: Kaadas The KA227-V Wi-Fi Video Doorbell Smart Deadbolt Lock with Dual Fingerprint Sensor is a great example of technological fusion, blending two burgeoning categories into a single efficient and powerful device. On the front door, where space for technology is at a premium, having one device that fulfills multiple roles is invaluable. A combined video doorbell and smart-lock solution saves space on the door and exterior, providing a clean, less cluttered aesthetic, setting Kaadas’ product apart in a crowded market.
SILVER Leviton
EV Series Charging Station with My Leviton app compatibility
Image: Leviton
The latest EV Series Charging Station series—which includes 32, 48, and 80 Amp Level 2 charging stations—now features integration with the My Leviton ecosystem. The My Leviton app lets users control their entire smart home from a single app, including lighting, load centers, and now EV Series chargers. More specifically, the app’s integration with the product allows users to remotely view the status of their charging session, stop and state a charging session if a vehicle is plugged in, and schedule what day and times a vehicle should charge.
